pythagoras.i
Class AbstractRectangle

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.i.AbstractRectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, IRectangle, IShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle
public abstract class AbstractRectangle
extends Object
implements IRectangle

Provides most of the implementation of IRectangle, obtaining only the location and dimensions from the derived class.

maxX

public int maxX()
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns the maximum x-coordinate of the framing rectangle. Note: this method differs from its floating-point counterparts in that it considers (x + width - 1) to be a rectangle's maximum x-coordinate.

Specified by:
maxX in interface IRectangle

maxY

public int maxY()
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns the maximum y-coordinate of the framing rectangle. Note: this method differs from its floating-point counterparts in that it considers (y + height - 1) to be a rectangle's maximum x-coordinate.

Specified by:
maxY in interface IRectangle

                              int ry,
                              int rw,
                              int rh)
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns the intersection of the specified rectangle and this rectangle (i.e. the largest rectangle contained in both this and the specified rectangle).

Specified by:
intersection in interface IRectangle

intersection

public Rectangle intersection(IRectangle r)
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns the intersection of the supplied rectangle and this rectangle (i.e. the largest rectangle contained in both this and the supplied rectangle).

Specified by:
intersection in interface IRectangle

union

public Rectangle union(IRectangle r)
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns the union of the supplied rectangle and this rectangle (i.e. the smallest rectangle that contains both this and the supplied rectangle).

Specified by:
union in interface IRectangle

outcode

public int outcode(int px,
                   int py)
Description copied from interface: IRectangle
Returns a set of flags indicating where the specified point lies in relation to the bounds of this rectangle. See IRectangle.OUT_LEFT, etc.
